about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: Born from necessity, grown with innovation, and looking to the future with a commitment: to regenerate the countryside.
about.inventorsText1: Pensagro was born from direct experience in the field. Our founder, Pablo Etcheverry, faced the same daily challenges as any producer at his Estancia Santa Marta. The need to optimize time and improve efficiency led him to create his own solutions.
about.inventorsText2: From automatic gates that save countless hours to telescopic syringes that facilitate sanitary management, each of our products arises from a real problem. This is our guarantee: we create functional, durable and practical tools because we live and understand the reality of rural work.
about.missionText: Develop, produce and market innovative products for the livestock sector, generating positive impact on work systems and collaborating in improving operational costs of the activity.
about.visionText: Contribute to advances in livestock farming, emphasizing 'Resource Conservation' and 'Good Livestock Practices', seeking efficiency and cost reduction by simplifying rural tasks.
about.valuesText: Offer innovative products under fair trade standards, have awareness of rural practices, respect for the environment and the commitment of our entire team with these principles.
about.philosophyTitle: Our Philosophy: Towards a Regenerative Future
about.philosophyText: We believe that livestock farming can and should be a force for the regeneration of our ecosystems. More than a supplier, we want to be your integral ally in the field. Our vision is to eliminate barriers so you can adopt regenerative practices in a simple, profitable and efficient way, building together a sustainable legacy.
about.expertSupportText: We guide you step by step in the transition to a more profitable and sustainable business model.
about.practicalKnowledgeText: We share tools and training so you master new technologies and optimize your management.
about.validateEffortText: We help you certify your good practices so your work is recognized and you access new markets.
about.growTogetherText: We foster a community of innovative producers to share experiences and strengthen the sector.
about.ctaText: Join hundreds of producers who are already working more efficiently and sustainably with Pensagro.
